# --description-- Add a second `p` element with the text `Serving size 2/3 cup (55g)`. # --hints-- You should have a second `p` element. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('p')?.length === 2); ``` Your second `p` element should be within your `body` element. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('p')?.[1]?.parentElement?.localName === 'body'); ``` Your second `p` element should come after your existing `p` element. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('p')?.[1]?.previousElementSibling?.localName === 'p'); ``` Your second `p` element should have the text `Serving size 2/3 cup (55g)`. ```js assert(document.querySelectorAll('p')?.[1]?.innerText === 'Serving size 2/3 cup (55g)'); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html --fcc-editable-region-- Nutrition Label

Nutrition Facts

8 servings per container

--fcc-editable-region-- ``` ```css ```
